channel.title: English on 42th openheart
channel.description: Recent content in English on 42th openheart

item.title: English
item.description: Apple’s glowing glass sphere is the newest spectacle on Singapore’s skyline Designed by Foster + Partners, the new Apple Marina Bay Sands store(滨海湾金沙店), due to open on Thursday, is a self-supporting dome entirely surrounded by water Physics loves a sphere, its preferred, purest form. For architects though, the box trumps the bubble(盒子胜过透明原型罩). They’re easier to engineer and offer more useful space. The new Apple Marina Bay Sands store in Singapore goes with the physics.
